meanings.definition: Highly skilled and efficient government officials.
meanings.sent1: The superbureaucrats swiftly processed all the paperwork.
meanings.sent2: The superbureaucrats in the office were known for their quick decision-making.
meanings.sent3: The superbureaucrats organized a surprise party for the mayor.
meanings.sent4: The superbureaucrats were the gears that kept the government running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The superbureaucrats' dedication to their work was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Describing individuals who excel in bureaucratic tasks.
meanings.sent1: She was a superbureaucrats employee, always completing tasks ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The superbureaucrats team ensured all procedures were followed meticulously.
meanings.sent3: The superbureaucrats approach to filing paperwork was surprisingly creative.
meanings.sent4: His superbureaucrats skills shone brightly during the audit.
meanings.sent5: The superbureaucrats mindset was evident in every detail of the project.
